meta.name: fragment
meta.title: The Human Diagnosis Project | Coronavirus (COVID-19) assessment tool

meta.name: description
meta.content: A free, no-signup, comprehensive assessment tool for the general public for Coronavirus (COVID-19) information around triage, isolation, and testing. This assessment is based on a community reviewed compilation of the latest recommended guidelines from leading institutions including the CDC, WHO, NHS, UCSF Health, and UW Medicine.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Coronavirus (COVID-19), Coronavirus, COVID-19, Coronavirus disease, Corona virus, Corona, Virus, COVID, SARS-COV 2, Testing, Risk, Triage, Isolation, Screening, Assessment, Tool, HDx, Human, Dx, Human Dx, HumanDx, Human Diagnosis Project, Self-assessment tool, Assessment tool, Self-assessment, Risk assessment tool, Triage assessment tool, Isolation assessment tool, Screening tool, What should you do, What should I do, Evaluation tool, Evaluation, COVID Symptoms, Symptoms, Checker, The Human Diagnosis Project
The Human Diagnosis Project | Coronavirus (COVID-19) assessment tool: What should I do?

A free, no-signup, comprehensive assessment tool for the general public for Coronavirus (COVID-19) information around triage, isolation, and testing. This assessment is based on a community reviewed compilation of the latest recommended guidelines from leading institutions including the CDC, WHO, NHS, UCSF Health, and UW Medicine.
